title: Online Teacher Role Awareness-Based Language Instructional Design for Giftedness Development

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced language proficiency and foundational concepts of instructional design
context.additional_context: A process applying strength-based instructional methods and designing digital language learning spaces optimized for remote work environments

learning_goals: Learners can adapt the three elements of gifted education environments (physical space, affective factors, pedagogical methods) to online contexts.
Teachers can design personalized activities to identify learners' linguistic strengths with over 80% accuracy based on their role awareness.
Participants can propose a "drastic online classroom redesign" plan applicable to real work environments through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
